name: Main City
description: The sprawling capital city of the realm, surrounded by towering marble walls and buzzing with activity. Golden spires of the royal palace pierce the clouds, while bustling market squares echo with merchants' cries.

name: Crimson Chalice Tavern
description: A raucous hub of activity where adventurers gather. The air smells of ale and roasted boar, with bardic ballads competing with dice games at oakwood tables.

notableNPCs.name: Grundar
notableNPCs.quote: What'll it be - ale, mead, or trouble?

name: Market District
description: A labyrinth of stalls selling exotic wares from distant lands. Spice merchants argue with silk traders while urchins pick pockets in the crowd.

name: Royal Palace Grounds
description: Immaculate gardens guarded by golden-armored sentinels. The marble palace shimmers with protective enchantments visible as violet ripples in the air.
